title: Wikipedia Module
text:
from wikiapp.wikipedia import random_page, Page
from nbdev import show_doc

title: Wikipedia Module
text:
Examples

page = random_page()
print("TITLE:", page.title)
print("EXTRACT:", page.extract)

TITLE: Renfe Class 321
EXTRACT: The Renfe Class 321 is a class of diesel-electric locomotives operated by Renfe in Spain, designed by Alco and built by them and by Euskalduna under licence.


If you do this again, you will get another random page.

page = random_page()
print("TITLE:", page.title)
print("EXTRACT:", page.extract)

TITLE: Ben Hueso
EXTRACT: Benjamin Hueso is an American businessman and politician who served in the California State Senate. A Democrat, he represented the 40th Senate District, which encompassed Imperial County and the border regions of San Diego County.


You can change the language if you want!

page = random_page(language="fr")
print("TITLE:", page.title)
print("EXTRACT:", page.extract)

TITLE: Main d'Anvers
EXTRACT: La mains d'Anvers est une pâtisserie d'origine belge flamande. Ce produit régional de la ville d'Anvers est reconnu par l'Union européenne comme spécialité traditionnelle garantie.

title: Wikiapp Docs
text:
Welcome to the documentation for Wikiapp! We are so glad to have you here.
This library will let you get random wikipedia page excerpts, in any language.
Yeah we know it does not do much! But it is a start.
❯ pixi run program 
✨ Pixi task (program in default): python wikiapp/console.py
Bunetice
Bunetice is a village and municipality in Košice-okolie District in
the Kosice Region of eastern Slovakia.

❯ pixi run program --language "fr"
✨ Pixi task (program in default): python wikiapp/console.py --language fr
Toyota Sienta
La Sienta est une voiture produite par la marque japonaise Toyota,
lancée en septembre 2003.

❯ pixi run program -l de
✨ Pixi task (program in default): python wikiapp/console.py -l de
Kunar (Fluss)
Der Fluss Kunar, der in Pakistan auch Chitral genannt wird, ist
ungefähr 260 km lang und fließt in südwestlicher Richtung vom
nordwestlichen Pakistan in das östliche Afghanistan.

❯ wikiapp 
Pangkor Laut Island
Pangkor Laut Island is a small island southwest of Pangkor Island,
Perak, Malaysia.

❯ wikiapp --language fr 
Vajkovce
Vajkovce est un village de Slovaquie situé dans la région de Košice.

❯ wikiapp -l es
Lamaze
Lamaze es una localidad de Santa Lucía, que forma parte del distrito
de Choiseul.

title: Console Module
text:
from wikiapp.console import main


from nbdev import show_doc
from click.testing import CliRunner





 <Command main> (*args:Any, **kwargs:Any)

*This is the console interface to ‘random_page’ function in wikipedia.py.
It comes with cool colors!*
